warning.title: Important
warning.content:
The data available here are frequently updated.

Brasil.IO, this app's data source reminds you that:

  • The state numbers can be different from city ones for two reasons:
    • State healthcare department stopped disclosing data by city and are only disclosing data by state (this is happening in SP);
    • State healthcare department disclosed wrong numbers (this sometimes happens).
  • Our data will not always match Ministry of Health because it may be that our collection has been done after the Ministry collection. We have the most recent data.

Special thanks to:

Craig Shaw for helping with the translation

Asaad Saad for his MWA Course

Yousef Quran for his contributions on how shapefiles and GeoJSON work.
